summary: REQ-25 requested a manual export of all files under `frontend/src/components/**` with full paths and complete contents. The diff shows no `frontend/src/components` files added/modified/removed; only `project_state.json` was modified, which is unrelated to the requested manual ZIP export.

missing_requirements.requirement: Export the entire `frontend/src/components` folder by outputting every file under `frontend/src/components/**` one by one, preserving exact relative paths and complete, unmodified contents; include no files outside that folder.
missing_requirements.reason: No files under `frontend/src/components/**` appear in the diff (Added: 0, Modified: 1 only `project_state.json`). Therefore the requested file-by-file export output is not present/implemented.

hallucinated_features.description: Modification of `project_state.json` summary/existing feature metadata unrelated to exporting `frontend/src/components/**`.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly scoped work to manual export/packaging of existing `frontend/src/components` files and stated no new app features; changing `project_state.json` does not contribute to exporting component files.
